activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9903
activity.text: Ok, I understand. I don't think the filter resetting after re-clicking appointments is an Issue but I could fix it if you would like.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9903
activity.text: Would it be ok if I changed the default filter to "Pick a date" before we have to re-click appointments? If it is supposed to filter by today, would it be good to keep the today filter after the appointments tab is clicked again?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9903
activity.text: May I be assigned this github issue? Thank you
